greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of exp(4*Pi*sqrt(163)) (or A060295^4).
comment: Near-integer obtained by taking Ramanujan's constant e^(Pi*sqrt(163)) to the fourth power.
reference: Henri Cohen, 'A Course in Computational Algebraic Number Theory', Springer-Verlag Berlin Heidelberg New-York 1996, p. 383.
link: MathOverflow, Why are powers of exp(Pi*sqrt(163)) almost integers?
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Almost Integer
results.author: _Mark A. Thomas_, Oct 16 2009
